id.description: Canid Genotype (MJ 40). Son of a side dalliance on the part of a Dinkley boy. CEO of DND Enterprises ("Discovery and Development") that consists of just the PCs.

aspects.aspect: From Bastard Canid Throwaway to Secret CEO
What I Don't Know Might Kill Me
I'm Great At Keeping Secrets! wag wag wag
Enki's Mine and I'm Not Sharing

stunts.stunt: Your sense of smell is far superior to that of humans. You can track and recognise people by scent, and gain a +2 bonus on Investigate and Notice rolls related to smell. (FH pg 10)

stunt.name: Hey! Where'd He Get That Gun?

stunts.stunt: At the start of any combat, Junior is inexplicably armed.
You can use Notice in place of Empathy to learn the aspects of a target through observation. (https://fate-srd.com/fate-core/notice#notice-stunts)

phase.events: Rich canid, paid by Dinkley family to stay away from home. The Dinkley family owns (among other things) a huge portion of Daedelus Corporation. The Dinkleys sponsored the design of Enki, which was crazy illegal due to eschewing the Asimov Protocols. Someone is still trying to tie up that loose end.
